mapper.sql: id, name, description, pic, url, type, weight, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.select: select url from banner_config where url = #{url};

select
from banner_config where type = #{type} order by weight desc

select
from banner_config order by type, weight desc
mapper.insert: insert into banner_config (id, name, description, pic, url, type, weight, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into banner_config
id,
name,
description,
pic,
url,
type,
weight,
create_time,
last_modify_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pic},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},

mapper.update:
update banner_config
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic = #{pic},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update banner_config set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select name, description, url from banner_config where type = #{type} order by create_time desc;
